t: Polyair Sells Off Cantar Cover Assets| Pool & Spa News
s: July 1, 2006 - Polyair Inter Pack Inc. has sold various assets of its pool division — Cantar Pool Products of Youngstown, Ohio — to the company’s former president. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
